Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
phys::ActorBaseThis is the base class from which all the actors inherit
phys::ActorContainerBaseA base class to unify the interface for different kinds of containers for holding actors
phys::ActorContainerVectorA simple Actor Container using a vector
phys::ActorRagDollThis is the ragdoll class for actors
phys::ActorRigidThis is the actor class for Rigid Objects
phys::ActorSoftThis is the actor class for Soft Objects
phys::ActorTerrainThis is actor class for terrain
phys::AreaEffectThis class is used to define area's in the world that have unique effects
phys::CameraThis is the camera class
phys::CameraManagerThis is the manager class for all camera functions
phys::ConeTwistConstraint
phys::ContainerBaseA base class to unify the interface for all game object containers
phys::EventBaseThe base class for all events
phys::EventCollisionThis is an event class used to track collsions in the physics world
phys::EventManagerThis is a container for Events and facilitates the transfer of data
phys::EventQuitThis is intended to convey the message that quitting needs to happen
phys::EventRenderTimeThis communicates the amount of time since the world was rendered
phys::EventUserInputThis is a container for MetaCodes that is used in the physEventManager
phys::Generic6DofConstraint
phys::Generic6DofSpringConstraint
phys::GraphicsManagerThis is intended to store basic graphics setting for the user
phys::GravityFieldThis is a gravity field implementation of the AreaEffect class
phys::Hinge2Constraint
phys::HingeConstraint
phys::debug::InternalDebugDrawerThis is used to draw wireframse for the Physics subsystem
phys::internal::Line3DDoes the bulk of the work that that the phys::LineGroup performs
phys::LineGroupThis is a group of consectutive line segments to be rendered together
phys::ManagerBaseThis is the base class from which all the World Managers inherit
phys::internal::MeshInfo
phys::MetaCodeThis Determines the kind of user input
phys::internal::PhysConvexDecomposition
phys::PhysicsManagerThis is simply a place for storing all the Physics Related functions
phys::internal::PhysMotionStateThis class is used by the actor class to sync between the physics world and the graphical world
phys::PlaneThis is used to represent a flat infinite slice of the game world
phys::Point2PointConstraint
phys::QuaternionThis is used to store information about rotation in 3d space
phys::RayThis is used to indicate a line with one end
phys::ResourceManagerThis is the manager responsible for the loading and unloading of files
phys::SliderConstraint
phys::SoundThis is an instance of a sound that can be played and manipulated
phys::SoundListenerThis is the listener class used for 3D sound
phys::SoundManagerThis is simply a place for storing all the Sound utilities and functions
phys::TestAEThis is a dummy class to test if the AE field works. Details will be output to the log
ThisThis is a helper data structure for gathering mesh information
phys::TypedConstraintThis is the base class for all constraints supported
phys::UniversalConstraint
phys::Vector3This is used to represent a point in space, or a vector through space
phys::Vector3WActorThis class is used to store or transfer a position relative to an Actor
phys::WorldThis is the main entry point for the entire library
phys::WorldGetSetA simple set of function to manage a pointer to the gameworld
phys::WorldQueryToolThis provides a number of optional tools for working with a phys::World
